pages.about: Discover HotelPro: Your Premier Destination for Luxury Accommodations x We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. Accept HotelPro About Services Rooms Contact Discover More About Our Hotel See More 01 WHO WE ARE Оur Hotel Stands As A Beacon Of Comfort Our team consists of dedicated professionals who are passionate about providing exceptional hospitality. From our front desk staff who greet you with a warm smile to our housekeeping team who ensures your room is immaculate, every member of our team is here to ensure your stay. With 12+ of years in the hospitality industry, we have honed our expertise in anticipating and fulfilling the needs of our guests. Whether you're traveling for business or leisure, we are here to make your stay comfortable, convenient, and memorable. support 24/7 Care and round-the-clock support throughout your stay. over 32 100 m2 We have enough space for you to relax and unwind according to your needs. more 12K guests More and more visitors are becoming our regular guests. 02 ADVANTAGES Your Gateway To Tranquility, Family Fun, And Adventure 01 Immerse yourself in the crisp mountain air and rejuvenate your senses with the soothing sounds of nature. Whether you're lounging on our outdoor terrace or taking a leisurely stroll through the surrounding woods, you'll feel a sense of tranquility and connection with the great outdoors. 02 Our warm and welcoming atmosphere is perfect for guests of all ages, ensuring that every member of your family feels right at home. With spacious accommodations, kid-friendly amenities, and a variety of onsite activities, including nature walks, scavenger hunts, and outdoor games, there's never a dull moment at Pro Hotel. 03 Positioned as a gateway to adventure, Pro Hotel provides convenient access to a wealth of outdoor activities and attractions in the surrounding area. Whether you're a nature enthusiast, an outdoor adventurer, or simply looking to explore the local culture, you'll find plenty of opportunities to satisfy your wanderlust. 03 TEAM Staff Who Provide Excessive Comfort And Create A Great Mood David Martinez Head Chef Work Experience: 12 years Michael Lee Chief Concierge Work Experience: 7 years Emily Johnson Front Office Manager Work Experience: 10 years Sarah Brown Spa Manager Work Experience: 5 years 04 SERVICES Our Services Whether seeking a romantic getaway, a family vacation, or simply a peaceful escape from the hustle and bustle of everyday life, the resort caters to every need and desire. Car Rental Secure your car rental at the best price and enjoy peace of mind. Cozy Spa Step into a world of relaxation and rejuvenation, where tranquility awaits and luxurious treatments. Travel Events We are specialize in crafting bespoke travel events tailored to your unique preferences and interests. See All HotelPro Join our community to stay in the groove with the latest updates. pages.policy: HotelPro Privacy Policy: Ensuring Transparency and Protection of Your Personal Data x We use cookies to ensure that we give you the best experience on our website. Accept HotelPro About Services Rooms Contact Discover More Privacy Policy Privacy Policy Information Gathering Practices Introduction This Privacy Policy sets forth the policies and practices of HotelPro ('we,' 'us,' or 'our') regarding the collection, use, and disclosure of Personal Data (as defined below) in connection with your use of our website. Definitions Personal Data** means any information that can be used to identify, locate, or contact a natural person. This may include, but is not limited to, your name, address, email address, phone number, credit card information, and travel history. Processing** means any operation or set of operations performed on Personal Data, whether or not by automated means, such as collection, recording, organization, structuring, storage, adaptation or alteration, retrieval, consultation, use, disclosure by transmission, dissemination or otherwise making available, alignment or combination, restriction, erasure or destruction. Collection of Personal Data When you create an account or book a hotel through the Website or Apps. When you contact us for customer support or make inquiries. When you interact with us on social media. When we receive information about you from third parties, such as when you book a hotel through an online travel agency. Disclosure of Personal Data To our affiliates and subsidiaries; To hotels and other travel providers to facilitate your bookings; To law enforcement or other government authorities when required by law or to protect our rights or property; The Website and Apps may contain links to third-party websites. These websites are not under our control, and we are not responsible for their privacy practices. We encourage you to review the privacy policies of any third-party websites you visit. Security of Personal Data We maintain reasonable administrative, technical, and physical safeguards to protect Personal Data from unauthorized access, use, disclosure, or destruction. However, no security system is impenetrable, and we cannot guarantee the absolute security of your Personal Data. Transfer of Personal Data Your Personal Data may be transferred to and processed in countries other than your own, where privacy laws may not provide the same level of protection as in your country. By using the Website, Apps, or Services, you consent to the transfer of your Personal Data to such other countries. Cookies and Tracking Technologies We may use cookies and other tracking technologies to collect information about your use of the Website, Apps, and Services. These technologies allow us to track your browsing behavior, improve the website's performance, and provide you with personalized content and advertising. Contacts HotelPro@gmail.com HotelPro Join our community to stay in the groove with the latest updates. About Us About Rooms Services Contact Links Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions (23) 562 28-93 HotelPro@gmail.com Baniyadih, Paunsara, Chhattisgarh © 2024. HotelPro All rights reserved.

Standard Cottage elax in rustic elegance, unwind on your private veranda, and immerse yourself in the beauty. Single Apartments Designed for solo travelers or cozy couples, our apartments offer a cozy retreat. 02 About HotelPro Our Story HotelPro's journey began with a vision to redefine luxury hospitality. It all started with a passionate team dedicated to creating an unparalleled guest experience. Drawing inspiration from the rich heritage of hospitality, HotelPro was founded on principles of excellence, sophistication, and personalized service. Driven by a commitment to innovation and guest satisfaction, HotelPro set out to curate a collection of exceptional properties, each offering a unique blend of elegance and comfort. Our founders believed that every guest deserved to experience the essence of luxury, and thus, HotelPro was born. At HotelPro, our story is a testament to our passion for hospitality and our unwavering commitment to creating extraordinary moments for every guest. Join us on our journey as we continue to redefine luxury hospitality and create lasting memories for years to come. 03 TESTIMONIALS What Our Guests Say About Us The ambiance of the hotel is serene and elegant, providing the perfect escape from the hustle and bustle of daily life. pages.thanks: Thank You for Choosing HotelPro: Your Gateway to Exceptional Hospitality Thanks for your order We're thrilled that you've chosen us to fulfill your shopping needs. Your order is currently being processed and will be shipped as soon as possible. In the meantime, you can track your order status online or by contacting our customer service team. We value your business and appreciate your trust in our products and services. To show our gratitude, we've included a special gift with your order. We hope you enjoy it! We use the following shipping methods for all of our shipments. Your order is expected to arrive within 3-5 business days. You will receive an email notification when your order has been shipped, which will include a tracking number that you can use to track the progress of your delivery. We appreciate your business and look forward to serving you again soon. If you have any feedback about your shopping experience, please share it with us. We're always looking for ways to improve our services and provide our customers with the best possible experience. You can view your order history and track your current orders by logging into your account on our website. If you need to make any changes to your order, such as updating your shipping address or canceling your order, please contact our customer service team as soon as possible. We value your privacy and do not share your personal information with any third parties. Your payment and shipping information is secure and encrypted. Your trust in us is invaluable. We deeply respect each of our guests and are committed to providing exceptional service. We aim to make every moment of your stay with us comfortable and enjoyable. We hope you enjoy your new purchase! Thank you for choosing us. We are honored to have you as our guest at HotelPro, and we are excited to ensure you have a delightful and memorable stay. We can't wait to make your stay with us a memorable one. We hope you feel the warmth and hospitality we bring to every aspect of HotelPro. Once again, thank you for your reservation. We are eager to welcome you to HotelPro and provide you with a remarkable hospitality experience. Welcome to HotelPro, where every moment is designed to exceed your expectations! Once again, thank you for your reservation. We appreciate your trust in us and are committed to making your stay with us exceptional. Let's make every moment count! Sincerely. Home
